translation.en: [man] Four-star general. There is no rank higher in the United States military.
translation.ja: 四つ星の将官は 米軍の最高ランクだ

translation.en: You report only to Sec Def and POTUS, the commander in chief.
translation.ja: 報告先は国防長官と 大統領だけ

translation.en: Congratulations, General Naird.
translation.ja: おめでとう ネアード

translation.en: [Mark Naird] Thank you. Thank you.
It has always been my dream to command a service branch.
translation.ja: 軍を率いるのが夢だった

translation.en: I have been shot down, both literally and figuratively,
translation.ja: 実際にも精神的にも 撃墜されたことはあるが

translation.en: but I have always gotten back up.
All right.
My old CO used to say that the greatest asset in an F-35,
translation.ja: 昔 司令官に こう言われた F-35戦闘機の財産は

translation.en: and that is a $100 million plane,
is its pilot.
When I was-- All right. I'll skip ahead.
translation.ja: 分かった　飛ばそう

translation.en: There's much more that I could say.
I only wish that...
my parents could have been here to see this.
translation.ja: 両親にこの姿を見せたかった

translation.en: But they were unable to get flights from New Jersey in time.
translation.ja: ニュージャージー州に いる

translation.en: Maggie, Erin, this is a Naird family team win.
translation.ja: マギー　エリン これは家族で得た勝利だ

translation.en: -So proud of you. -Thanks.
I don't get it.
Dad, when you made three-star, we had 100 guests and a band.
translation.ja: ゲスト100人に 音楽隊もいたのに…

translation.en: It's a different administration, bug.
This one's... a little more chaotic.
The Air Force chief's house in Arlington is gorgeous and comes with a staff. Thank you.
translation.ja: アーリントンにある 空軍大将の豪華な家に住める

translation.en: Dad, I am so proud of you.
-Thanks. -General.
Joint Chiefs in five minutes. Come on.
Kick.
Get lost, Naird. This is for four-stars.
translation.ja: うせろ　四つ星だけだ

translation.en: Like me.
They didn't tell you? Or did you forget?
Like you forgot to get competitive bidding for the AT-6B.
translation.ja: AT-6Bウルヴァリンの 入札も忘れた

translation.en: Tell me what? That you wear a dress?
I knew that already.
Gender roles.
Offensive. And out of date. Just like you.
translation.ja: 君と同じで時代錯誤だ

translation.en: But I don't have to listen to it anymore.
Good luck with your retirement, Kick.
And I say that facetiously,
translation.ja: 君は女たらしで 根性が腐ってる

translation.en: because you're a crook and a womanizer, and I hate your guts.
translation.ja: 君は女たらしで 根性が腐ってる 大嫌いだ

translation.en: God, that felt good.
Welcome, gentlemen, thank you for joining us.
translation.ja: 諸君　大統領が この改革の件で

translation.en: POTUS wants to make some changes.
translation.ja: 諸君　大統領が この改革の件で 〝国防長官 ジョン･ブランスミス〞

translation.en: He's tweeting about it in five minutes, so let's hope you like it.
translation.ja: 〝国防長官 ジョン･ブランスミス〞 ５分後にツイートする お楽しみに

translation.en: I wanna welcome our newest four-star general, Mark Naird,
translation.ja: 新たに大将に昇格した マーク･ネアード

translation.en: formerly number two at the Air Force.
He's done an amazing job, has a most distinguished career.
translation.ja: 優れた功績を残している

translation.en: -Our nation's internet in-- -[Mark] Excuse me.
Why is Kick still in the room? I don't-- Hmm.
translation.ja: なぜキックが ここに？

translation.en: Our nation's internet, including Twitter,
translation.ja: ツイッターも含めた ネット環境は

translation.en: runs through our vulnerable space satellites.
translation.ja: ツイッターも含めた ネット環境は 衛星に依存している

translation.en: POTUS wants complete space dominance. Boots on the moon by 2024.
translation.ja: 大統領は宇宙を制し 2024年までに月基地を作れと

translation.en: To that end, the president is creating a new branch.
translation.ja: そこで新たな軍が創設された

translation.en: Space Force. Which Mark will run.
translation.ja: 宇宙軍だ　マークが率いる

translation.en: [scoffs] Hmm? What?
In close cooperation with Air Force, which Kick will still head.
translation.ja: キックの空軍が協力する

translation.en: Oh, you've gotta be kidding me.
[John] This is not a joke. His words! Boots on the moon in 2024.
translation.ja: 大統領の命令だ 2024年までに月に基地(ブーツ)を！

translation.en: Actually, he said, "Boobs on the moon," but we believe that to be a typo.
translation.ja: 実は“月におっぱい(ブーブ)を”と あったが誤字だろう

translation.en: This is bullshit. Space is part of the air.
translation.ja: バカげてる 宇宙は空の一部だから ネアードは私の部下だ

translation.en: Naird works for me.
translation.ja: 宇宙は空の一部だから ネアードは私の部下だ

translation.en: Uh, hang on. Hang on. I don't think there's air in space.
translation.ja: 待って　宇宙に空気(エア)はないわ

translation.en: There certainly isn't any damn water, Admiral, so you don't get an opinion.
translation.ja: 水もない　黙ってろ

translation.en: Air Force used to just be part of the Army, Kick. I'd like to stuff you both back in.
translation.ja: 空軍は陸軍から派生した どちらも黙れ

translation.en: If there's no air or water, two questions.
What is it exactly, and why can't they hear you scream?
translation.ja: 宇宙って何だ？ なぜ叫んでも聞こえない？

translation.en: Well, at least Coast Guard isn't last in line anymore.
translation.ja: これで沿岸警備隊は ビリじゃない

translation.en: -Oh, you're still last. -Oh, definitely last.
You're behind Salvation Army, Louis.
translation.ja: 救世軍の下だよ ルイス

translation.en: [laughing]
So, how are you handling this?
translation.ja: このままで いいの？

translation.en: I know you wanted the Air Force, and you're not the most flexible person.
translation.ja: 空軍から外れるのよ 対応できる？

translation.en: [Mark] I can be flexible if I'm ordered to be.
I'll admit I was a little disappointed at first.
translation.ja: 確かに最初は少し 失望したんだけど…

translation.en: But then I saw this painting. John Paul Jones.
translation.ja: ジョン･ポール･ジョーンズの 絵を見て こう思った

translation.en: And it made me think.
translation.ja: ジョン･ポール･ジョーンズの 絵を見て こう思った 〝米国海軍創設者〞

translation.en: The founder of the Space Force, that's going to be me.
translation.ja: 宇宙軍の創設者は 私になるんだと

translation.en: This is such a great opportunity to start something from the ground up.
translation.ja: 素晴らしいチャンスだ ゼロから何かを始める

translation.en: We're gonna build a huge new base.
Well, DC real estate, the way it is, you'll be lucky if it's this side of Dulles Airport.
translation.ja: ダレス国際空港より手前なら 地価は最高よ

translation.en: Oh, well, it's definitely gonna be on the other side of Dulles.
translation.ja: いや　絶対に空港の 向こう側になる

translation.en: By about 2,000 miles.
-We're going to Colorado. -What?
There's this old NORAD facility that's got a lot of potential.
translation.ja: ＮＯＲＡＤ(航空宇宙防衛司令部)の古い施設が 使えそうだ

translation.en: And Colorado? Oh!
Up and coming. Did you know Amazon put their new headquarters there?
translation.ja: ホットな地域だ アマゾンの本社もある

translation.en: Really?
No. But they seriously considered it.
translation.ja: いや でも検討したのは確かだ

translation.en: You and Erin are gonna love it there.
-Gonna learn how to ride horses. -[sobs]
[Mark] It's gonna be a good year.
And next year at this time...
we might have boots on the moon.
[truck horn blaring]
translation.ja: “ロケットパイ” コロラド州 ワイルドホース

translation.en: Big launch today, huh?
translation.ja: コロラド州 ワイルドホース 打ち上げだね

translation.en: Launch?
At the new base.
What base?
Oh, right. It's a secret.
If you told me, you'd have to kill me, right? [laughs]
♪ That's what I wanted to be ♪
♪ But now that I am a spaceman ♪
-[Mark] Hey. -Sir.
There's a guy in the trunk. Hold him till after the launch.
translation.ja: トランクの男を拘束しろ

translation.en: What the fuck, man?
So then you say do bat your eye--
-Big launch today, sir. -Yes.
The congressional delegation will be arriving for lunch.
translation.ja: 議会スタッフとランチ

translation.en: You have to speak for ten minutes -at the local high school. -[sighs]
Don't worry. We have a new helo pilot. We'll get you in and out of there in no time.
translation.ja: ヘリがあるから 分刻みでいけます

translation.en: And the launch at 1700 is set to be a live feed on the East Coast.
translation.ja: 17時の発射は 東海岸で放送される予定です

translation.en: You have a light day today, so you can start in the gym, and your calendar says it's a leg day.
translation.ja: まずはジムへどうぞ 脚を鍛える日です

translation.en: Dr. Mallory.
Oh! Dr. Mallory is waiting for you.
Yes, he is.
-He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.ja: 口止めで 助かるよ

translation.en: [Mallory] We need to cancel the launch.
No.
Senator Schugler, Pitosi, and the angry young congresswoman are coming.
translation.ja: 議員の目の前で成功させて―

translation.en: They need to see a success so we can keep our funding.
Oh. My idea of success would not be a six-billion-dollar piece of hardware
translation.ja: 60億ドルの機体が デンバー上空で散っても

translation.en: breaking up over Denver.
That is not going to happen.
Look, I don't like to pull rank,
-but I order you to postpone the launch. -Ah... Okay?
translation.ja: 君に発射の中止を命じる いいね？

translation.en: There's too much moisture in the air. We prefer a less ionized environment.
translation.ja: 湿気が多すぎる イオンが少ないほうがいい

translation.en: You are a civilian advisor.
There are always going to be risks.
Conditions are never perfect.
translation.ja: 完璧な状況などあり得ん

translation.en: They're supposed to be perfect tomorrow.
The delegation will be back in Washington tomorrow.
-You know, Mark, when I hired you... -I hired you.
translation.ja: 君を雇った時… 逆だ

translation.en: ...I felt your best quality was your ability to listen to good advice.
translation.ja: 君の長所は助言を 聞き入れるところだと感じた

translation.en: If you've lost that, we may have to look elsewhere.
translation.ja: 聞かないなら他をあたる

translation.en: We. Who is this "we" that you keep talking about?
translation.ja: 誰が他をあたるんだよ？

translation.en: That is above your pay grade.
Nothing is above my pay grade at this base.
Just postpone the launch, dear.
Nope.
So, no launch today, I hear.
No, launch is still on.
Oh. I'll have to tell the base biologist.
translation.ja: 生物学者に知らせなきゃ

translation.en: all the endangered lizards within 600 yards of the launch site.
translation.ja: 発射台近くのトカゲを 救出するんです

translation.en: I canceled her because Mallory told me the launch was scrubbed.
translation.ja: 発射台近くのトカゲを 救出するんです 博士が中止だと…

translation.en: No! Nobody gets to scrub anything but me.
translation.ja: 私しか中止にはできん

translation.en: Oh. Got it, sir.
Hello, Yuri.
Oh. Uh, Yuri's in there.
-I know. -He told me not to say anything.
Thank you, Brad.
[with Russian accent] Do you keep breath mints anywhere?
What are you doing in here?
Um, I heard the launch was scrubbed.
That is not accurate, Yuri.
Call me Bobby. It's more reassuring.
translation.ja: ボビーと呼んでください

translation.en: Can I see technical specifications for the Epsilon part E-16f fuel pump?
translation.ja: イプシロンの燃料ポンプの 仕様書を見たい

translation.en: Why would you need to see that?
Well, as observer from ISS partner country, I just want to... observe it.
translation.ja: ＩＳＳ(宇宙ステーション)のパートナーとして 確認したい

translation.en: Hmm. Well, that is weird.
translation.ja: どうも気が進まないね

translation.en: Your president desires close cooperation and good relations between US and Russia.
translation.ja: そちらの大統領は ロシアとの緊密な連携を 望んでいる

translation.en: Come on. We're not China here.
I'm sure if the president would like me to show you something, he will let me know.
translation.ja: 大統領の命令が あれば見せよう

translation.en: Very well. Expect a text from the secure phone.
translation.ja: 了解です 盗聴防止電話(セキュアフォン)で連絡が

translation.en: How do you know about the secure phone?
I don't know about the secure phone.
-You just said "secure phone." -No, I didn't.
translation.ja: 盗聴防止電話(セキュアフォン)と いえ

translation.en: -Yes, you did. You said "secure phone." -I didn't say that. You just said it.
translation.ja: さっき言ったじゃないか

translation.en: -No, I did not. -Yes, you did.
Breath mints.
Here they are.
[sergeant] ♪ I don't know but I been told ♪
[sergeant] ♪ Outer space is very cold ♪
Yo! Oh.
-General Naird. -We may have to scrub the Epsilon launch.
translation.ja: 大将 イエロージャケットは 発射できるか？

translation.en: -Is Yellowjacket ready to show off? -I doubt it.
translation.ja: イエロージャケットは 発射できるか？ さあ

translation.en: Oh, for Christ's sake. They're a billion dollars and six months over.
You're right. We should be able to see something.
-Damn right. Let's move. -I'll make a call.
translation.ja: そうとも 連絡します

translation.en: -Are you running? -No. Keep up.
Will Yellowjacket be impressive enough?
First super-pressurized ultra-fast satellite-killer killer missile?
translation.ja: 超高速衛星 イケイケミサイルですよ

translation.en: Fucking impressive to me.
Oh. Hey. Looks good.
-Yeah. -[Mark] Sweet. Very sleek. -Like the yellow fins. -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: つやつやのキハダのようだ

translation.en: Do we have enough of these to do a test launch later as well?
translation.ja: 試し打ちする数はあるか？

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Okay, let's do this.
-Go time. -[man on radio] Roger that, go time.
Well, that's not ready yet.
-How much was that prototype? -Four.
-Million? -Middle schools.
translation.ja: …百万？ ４つの中学校が建つ金額

translation.en: Cost as much as four new middle schools.
Fuck!
-You are running! -Keep up.
So I hear we're going with Yellowjacket this afternoon?
No.
Sorry, Sheila. Still have to grab those lizards.
translation.ja: シーラ トカゲを救え

translation.en: Hey.
Oh. Fuck Tony's in there.
translation.ja: Ｆ(ファック)･トニーが中に

translation.en: -Good morning, my general. -Good morning.
I have your daily tweet ready for you to review,
translation.ja: 宇宙軍大将のツイッター

translation.en: and I think you're gonna love it. You're gonna eat it up. Go. Yum-yum.
translation.ja: ぜひ本日分のご確認を

translation.en: I don't get it.
Any of it?
Okay. All right.
translation.ja: 「スター･ウォーズ」の 新作はご存じで？

translation.en: -You know there's a new Star Wars out? -Yes.
translation.ja: 「スター･ウォーズ」の 新作はご存じで？ ああ

translation.en: And Wendy's has a new hamburger that they're serving rare, so...
translation.ja: ウェンディーズも 新作バーガーを

translation.en: So what I am saying is that if I had a lightsaber,
I would be able to cook... this hamburger better.
translation.ja: “このバーガーを ウマく焼く”？

translation.en: There you go. It took a while, but you got it.
-How is this relevant to the mission? -That is culturally relevant.
translation.ja: 何の関係が？ 宇宙ネタ

translation.en: I don't see how being snarky about a fast-food hamburger is culturally anything.
translation.ja: ファストフードは 宇宙軍と何の関係もない

translation.en: Do you even understand what is at stake here?
translation.ja: 君は何も分かっとらんな

translation.en: I'm trying to put boots on the moon. Boots on the moon.
translation.ja: 月に基地を 作ろうとしてるんだぞ

translation.en: A laser sword is a child's toy.
It's a lightsaber. Did you hear yourself? Laser sword?
translation.ja: ライトセーバーを “レーザー剣”とは笑える

translation.en: Okay. I think we're done.
-You don't understand because you're old. -Okay.
translation.ja: 世代が違う そうか

translation.en: You get likes by dunking on the Twitter accounts
translation.ja: 人気の店でツイートすれば “いいね”が増える

translation.en: -of sassy fast-food brands. -Sassy.
translation.ja: 人気の店でツイートすれば “いいね”が増える 人気？

translation.en: I don't even know why I'm explaining clapback theory to you. Every time I explain anything, it seems to just go "phew."
translation.ja: 常識なのに何度 説明しても 分からないとは

translation.en: How about this for sass?
-You're fired. -What?
Your services will no longer be needed here at Space Force.
You're firing me for writing a perfect tweet?
translation.ja: 完璧なツイートなのに？

translation.en: Is that why you're firing me? Fine, fine, fine. You know what?
translation.ja: 完璧なツイートなのに？ 分かりました フォロワーは3000人の エンジニアだけのくせに

translation.en: Enjoy your 3,000 engineer followers, because, honestly, you are hopeless.
translation.ja: フォロワーは3000人の エンジニアだけのくせに

translation.en: -Brad. -Yes, sir.
Would you make sure that Tony is detained until after the launch so he doesn't tweet anything snotty?
translation.ja: トニーを拘束して 余計なツイートを阻止しろ

translation.en: -[Brad] Got it. -Thank you.
-Secure the phone. -Yes, sir.
What's going on? Are you serious? Stop--
Siri, send tweet. Send tweet!
[gasps] Ooh, gotcha.
A little low, don't you think?
I'm flying safely, sir.
But I can lift up if you like.
At your discretion.
You're, uh-- You're rated for F-35s, aren't you, sir?
translation.ja: F-35を飛ばせるそうですね

translation.en: Yes, I believe I've flown every F series from the Tomcat to the F-117 Nighthawk.
translation.ja: Ｆシリーズ全部だ トムキャットから F-117ナイトホークまで

translation.en: That's dope, sir.
What's your name?
Captain Angela Ali, sir.
ROTC?
OCS. Uh, I'm actually a prior. I transferred as a First Class, sir.
translation.ja: 幹部候補です 異動して一等兵に

translation.en: Air Force or Space Force?
Space Force, sir.
You don't like to use your full title?
Sorry, sir. Spaceman First Class.
translation.ja: 失礼　宇宙一等兵です

translation.en: Nothing to be ashamed of.
Air Force has airmen. Space Force has spacemen.
translation.ja: 空軍は空軍兵 宇宙軍なら宇宙軍兵

translation.en: Nothing embarrassing or comical about it.
translation.ja: どこも ふざけてない

translation.en: Yes, sir.
[Mark] The Earth is the only planet in our universe that we know of
translation.ja: 地球は宇宙で唯一 生命が 息づく星と考えられる

translation.en: that sustains life.
translation.ja: 息づく星と考えられる

translation.en: Fifty years ago,
Americans landed on the lunar surface and took that photo.
translation.ja: アメリカは月面で この写真を撮った

translation.en: Hashtag "awesome," huh?
Well, guess what, kids? We're going back.
translation.ja: 驚くな　我々は月へ戻る

translation.en: Not for science this time. Not to collect a bunch of rocks.
translation.ja: 研究目的で岩を 集めるわけじゃない

translation.en: But to occupy.
Boots on the moon!
translation.ja: 基地(ブーツ)を置くんだ

translation.en: Boots on the moon.
And even though this will be an international mission,
translation.ja: これは国際的なミッションで

translation.en: harnessing the best and brightest minds from around the globe,
translation.ja: あらゆる国の優秀な人材が 関わるが―

translation.en: rest assured these will be US boots.
translation.ja: 安心しろ　米国の基地(ブーツ)だ

translation.en: Boots with US feet in 'em, I mean.
Can't be certain where the boots will actually be made.
translation.ja: ブーツの生産国は分からない

translation.en: Maybe Mexico. Maybe Portugal. We're getting bids on the boots.
translation.ja: メキシコかポルトガルか… 検討中だ

translation.en: One thing's for certain, though. Those boots are gonna have our feet in 'em.
translation.ja: とにかく このブーツを 履くのは米国だ

translation.en: Seniors,
if you enlist for a four-year stint as a space cadet,
translation.ja: 士官候補生として４年間 宇宙軍で兵役につけば

translation.en: you can earn up to $35,000 for college.
translation.ja: ３万5000ドルの 大学費用が稼げる

translation.en: I don't know what else to call it but a pretty sweet deal.
translation.ja: これ以上 ウマい話はないだろう

translation.en: So what's it gonna be?
You gonna sit there like an idiot doing nothing?
translation.ja: バカみたいに何もせず 座ってるか？

translation.en: Or are you gonna join Space Force and shoot for the stars?
translation.ja: 宇宙軍に入って 夢をつかむか？

translation.en: Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you. Thanks for coming.
-We're signing up, General. -See you on the moon, gentlemen.
translation.ja: 入隊します 月で会おう

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, bug.
I need $100.
Bobby's taking me to the desert for a pop-up concert.
translation.ja: ボビーと砂漠のコンサートに

translation.en: Absolutely not. Hello.
Dad, it's fine. Just, like, give me the money.
translation.ja: いいから ちょうだい

translation.en: Uh, no.
Okay, but you know Bobby. You work with him.
I know him? Bobby who?
Bobby Telatovich.
Yuri?
That's the Bobby that you've been seeing? He's ten years older than you.
Jesus Christ, Erin.
Hello. Have a good day.
He's very sweet.
No, he's not. He is a bad, bad man.
translation.ja: いや　すごい悪者だ

translation.en: Well, it wasn't my idea to move to this shithole.
translation.ja: パパのせいでクソ田舎に

translation.en: I never called this town a shithole. It's a very fine town. Very fine.
translation.ja: よさないか いい町だ　とても

translation.en: Well, I'm going with or without you, and I guess if I have no money,
translation.ja: 絶対に行くわ お金がなければ ボビーに借りるしかない

translation.en: I'll just be totally reliant on Bobby.
translation.ja: お金がなければ ボビーに借りるしかない

translation.en: Have to do whatever Bobby says.
Don't play that game with me, Erin. It's not going to work.
I'll talk it over with Mommy.
Thank you, General.
Hello.
How you doing?
Okay.
-You eating all right? -Oh, yeah. Yeah.
translation.ja: 食べてるか？ もちろん

translation.en: They're letting me grow radishes in a window box, and I can pretty much eat them whenever I want.
translation.ja: 房の中で野菜を育てて 好きな時に食べてる

translation.en: -Nice. -Yeah.
And there's this guard, Louise, she slips me some food sometimes.
translation.ja: 看守のルイーズも 食べ物をくれるしね

translation.en: Well, you look-- You look great.
[sighs] I miss you. Very much.
Mark, I'm gonna be in here a long time.
translation.ja: マーク 私は当分 出られない

translation.en: So if you need... companionship--
translation.ja: だから もし 相手が必要なら…

translation.en: No. No. No! [scoffs]
No. I am your husband.
Yes, but I'll understand if you--
translation.ja: そうだけど理解するわ

translation.en: Absolutely not. I don't want you to bring this up again. Please.
translation.ja: 他は要らない 二度と言わないでくれ

translation.en: How's Erin?
Erin wants to go to a concert in the desert this weekend with this older Russian guy,
translation.ja: ロシア野郎とコンサートに 行くと言うんだ

translation.en: who I think is just using her to get information.
Eighteen is that age where you make mistakes and figure some things out.
Do you think I should let her go?
Well, I just don't know how you can stop her.
Louise says if you can't do anything about a situation,
translation.ja: ルイーズいわく 抵抗しても無駄な時は

translation.en: you might as well lean back and let it happen.
translation.ja: 相手に身を任せろって

translation.en: -Louise sounds like a good friend. -[Maggie] Well...
Oh, shoot. Gonna be late.
Set me down next to the BX, please.
Uh... I can't do that, sir. I have to land on the designated pad.
translation.ja: 指定のポート以外はムリです

translation.en: I am telling you to do it, so you can do it.
translation.ja: 私が言うんだから平気だ

translation.en: I have a congressional delegation down there waiting for me.
translation.ja: 議員たちを待たせてる

translation.en: Um, it's only another 100 yards, sir,
and I'm sure you're gonna do great with the delegation, even if you are a minute late.
translation.ja: １分遅れても 会食はうまくいきます

translation.en: Thin ice, Captain. Thin ice.
translation.ja: 危険な反抗だぞ　大尉

translation.en: Hey, General? General. A word.
-I'm late for a meeting. -I ran the numbers,
translation.ja: 遅刻する 試算したのですが 加速器の下に

translation.en: and I can't put the bowling alley under the cyclotron
translation.ja: 試算したのですが 加速器の下に

translation.en: unless the bowling alley is curved,
translation.ja: ボーリングのレーンは 置けません

translation.en: -and I don't see how that works. -Get it done.
translation.ja: ボーリングのレーンは 置けません あなたに任せる

translation.en: -I have complete confidence in you, ma'am. -Okay, it's Kelly.
translation.ja: あなたに任せる ケリーと呼んでください

translation.en: It's Kelly.
translation.ja: ケリーと呼んでください

translation.en: -Oh. Nice of you to join us. -My apologies.
translation.ja: 来たね 失礼　問題が起きて…

translation.en: Had a little chopper trouble.
translation.ja: 失礼　問題が起きて…

translation.en: So, uh, what's good here?
I would recommend the tuna.
Sushi?
How much are taxpayers paying to fly that in?
translation.ja: 輸送に税金を使ってるの？

translation.en: A sandwich.
I knew that. It was a joke.
And a good one.
But with a grain of truth.
Kick Grabaston at Air Force told us confidentially that this base was a complete waste of money.
translation.ja: 空軍のキック大将は この基地は無駄だと

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I assure you we are on track,
translation.ja: 皆さん ご心配なく イプシロンは予定通り 17時に発射します

translation.en: and Epsilon will launch at 1700 hours.
translation.ja: イプシロンは予定通り 17時に発射します

translation.en: And the Epsilon is the new spacecraft fighter, right?
That is correct.
What kind of armament will it have on board? Laser cannon? Pulse weapon?
translation.ja: 搭載してるのはレーザー砲？

translation.en: I believe those are from Star Wars.
But if I had a laser cannon,
translation.ja: 私がレーザー砲を 持っていたら―

translation.en: I would probably use it to cook a Wendy's hamburger.
translation.ja: ウェンディーズの バーガーを焼く

translation.en: The Epsilon is equipped with a kinetic disabling system.
translation.ja: イプシロンには 機能停止システムが

translation.en: -Meaning? -It can eject a metal net,
translation.ja: つまり？ 金属ネットを放出します

translation.en: and it is our hope that we can get this net to tangle with enemy satellites.
translation.ja: 予定では それが敵の衛星に絡まる

translation.en: Exploding them?
Tangling them.
This better be one fucking flawless launch.
translation.ja: 無事 発射するといいわね

translation.en: Six billion for a net. Not a good look.
-[cell phone buzzing] -Oh, sorry. Excuse me.
Oh, God. I have to take this.
Dad, is everything all right?
Yeah, only your mom has run off again.
I can't see her. I'd run after her,
translation.ja: 見つからん 捜したいが わしも今朝 発作を起こして

translation.en: but I think I had a small heart attack this morning.
translation.ja: 捜したいが わしも今朝 発作を起こして

translation.en: You know, I'm feeling a little draggy.
Okay, Dad, is the caretaker there? Please put the caretaker on.
translation.ja: 介護士はどこだい 彼に代わって

translation.en: He's on his way. He should be here any minute.
So how's the lady situation?
[sighs] Well, as you know, my wife is in prison.
Uh-huh. You know what I had to do yesterday? I had to crawl under the house to check a leak.
translation.ja: 昨日は床下に潜って 水漏れを確認した

translation.en: No, Dad. Dad, don't do--
We have people to crawl under the house, Dad.
translation.ja: そんなことは業者に任せて

translation.en: I crawled under. I didn't tell anybody, and they didn't know I was under there.
translation.ja: 潜ったことは 誰にも言ってない

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Please, Dad, don't, don't-- Don't crawl under the house!
translation.ja: 頼むから 床下には潜らないでくれ

translation.en: So how's things? How's your-- How's your wife?
She's fine.
Yeah, you two are gonna make a great couple.
-Is the caretaker there, Dad? -Uh, yeah.
-What are you doing? -Put the caretaker on.
-Have to get in the house. -What?
-Put the caretaker on. -Get in the house.
He wants to talk to you.
Oh, God. I don't know what to do.
translation.ja: 大変だ お父様は入院すべきです

translation.en: Your father should be in the hospital.
translation.ja: お父様は入院すべきです

translation.en: Your mama is somewhere in the streets in her nightgown.
translation.ja: お母様はガウンで外へ

translation.en: Can you come home and help me?
I wish I could, Jean Baptiste, but I'm having kind of a day of it myself.
translation.ja: そうしたいが私も忙しい

translation.en: And, please, don't let my dad go under the house again.
translation.ja: 父さんを床下に潜らせるな

translation.en: I try. You know he do whatever he want.
-No, no, no, no! -Ask him... You have to keep eyes on him. Do you understand?
translation.ja: いや　見張ってればいいんだ

translation.en: -Yes, Mr. Naird. -Ask him how his wife is.
-How is your wife? -Ugh, God.
translation.ja: 奥さんは？ 勘弁しろよ　ちょっと待て

translation.en: All right, hold on a second, Jean Baptiste.
translation.ja: 勘弁しろよ　ちょっと待て

translation.en: Brad, I'm going to need you to task the satellite
translation.ja: ブラッド 衛星で例の位置情報を頼む

translation.en: -over Nutley, New Jersey, again. -Yes, I'm on it.
translation.ja: ブラッド 衛星で例の位置情報を頼む 了解

translation.en: She's in the Rite-Aid parking lot.
-Text me when she's in the car. -Okay. Thank you, Mr. Naird.
translation.ja: 頼んだぞ ありがとう

translation.en: [man] Oh, he is blowing it just like you thought.
translation.ja: 〝アメリカ宇宙軍〞 予想通り失敗してますよ 予想通り失敗してますよ

translation.en: Yeah, it is a complete shit show.
My dry cleaner. Yeah, yeah, they, uh, they lost my dress whites.
translation.ja: クリーニング屋です シャツをなくしやがった

translation.en: -I canceled the launch. -[gasps]
[panting] Mallory's waiting for you.
-He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
-I didn't say anything. -Well done, Bradley.
translation.ja: 私は何も よろしい

translation.en: -Oh, thank you, sir. -[Mark exhales]
It's a six-billion-dollar decision. We can't risk it.
translation.ja: 60億かけてるんだ 失敗はできない

translation.en: It's a lot for a scientist, but in the military, we have to risk lives.
translation.ja: 科学者には巨額だが 軍人は命をかけている

translation.en: At 50 grand a year,
it would take 120,000 years to earn $6 billion.
translation.ja: 60億ドルを稼ぐのに 12万年かかることになる

translation.en: That is the entire lifetime earnings of 3,000 people.
translation.ja: これは3000人が一生をかけて 稼ぐ金額に相当する

translation.en: Now, how many times can a country waste the entire lifetime earnings
translation.ja: 一体全体 どこの国が 何千人もの生涯賃金を―

translation.en: of thousands of its citizens without something really bad happening?
translation.ja: 罪悪感も持たずに 何度も無駄遣いできるのかね

translation.en: Are you still upset about the button covers?
translation.ja: ボタンカバーの恨みか？

translation.en: A thousand dollars for a plastic button cover? That's insane!
translation.ja: ボタンカバーに1000ドル？ バカげてる！

translation.en: -So you think we'll be ready by Novem-- -[button clicks]
-[automated voice] Three. -[alarms blaring]
-Two. -Shit.
One.
Sorry.
How many times do I need to apologize?
Just come out to the launch site and we'll show you.
translation.ja: 発射台に来たまえ 私たちが説明する

translation.en: The proper humidity for launch is 40 percent. Today it is at 54 percent.
translation.ja: 発射に最適な湿度は40％未満 今日の湿度は54％

translation.en: This can affect oxygenation and fuel burn.
translation.ja: 酸素投与や燃焼に悪い

translation.en: The amount of fuel measured is very precise.
translation.ja: 燃料の計量は繊細です

translation.en: If fuel is insufficient, the rocket returns to Earth without reaching orbit.
translation.ja: 不足すると軌道に乗れず 戻ってきます

translation.en: Where you from, Chan?
-Ohio. -Originally?
translation.ja: オハイオ その前は？

translation.en: What does that have to do with any-- Are--
Are you suggesting Chan is a Chinese spy?
translation.ja: チャンが中国の スパイだとでも？

translation.en: Ah. So we have heard from Mr. Chan.
translation.ja: チャンさんの意見は聞いた

translation.en: -Doctor. -Dr. Chan.
I'd like to hear another opinion.
Perhaps somebody willing to dissent from the party line.
Who'd like to give me a good reason why we should launch today? Anyone?
translation.ja: 今日 発射すべき理由を 語れる者はいるか？

translation.en: So I can weigh the pros and cons?
translation.ja: 両方を秤(はかり)にかける

translation.en: Don't you have any mavericks on your team, Mallory?
translation.ja: 異端者は いないのか？

translation.en: -I say launch. -Great.
And you are Dr....
Just call me Eddie. -Oh, shit. -Ain't a doctor.
translation.ja: エディさ　博士(ドクター)じゃない

translation.en: I go to a bunch of 'em, though.
translation.ja: 医者(ドクター)には行く

translation.en: Wonderful. So those in favor of postponement
translation.ja: では延期に賛成なのは

translation.en: are me and Dr. Chan, Dr. Swedberg,
translation.ja: 私とチャンと スウェッドバーグ

translation.en: Dr. Bohr, Dr. Revredesh,
translation.ja: ボー　レブレディッシュ

translation.en: Dr. Yamato, Dr. Lowenstein,
translation.ja: ヤマト ローウェンシュタイン

translation.en: Dr. Washington, and Dr. Zisk.
translation.ja: ワシントン　ジスク

translation.en: In favor of launch are you and Eddie.
translation.ja: 発射に賛成なのは 君とエディ

translation.en: Any last name, Eddie?
None that I care to mention.
Okay.
Chan, what's behind your back?
It's an umbrella, sir.
Did you think it was a sword cane? Samurai sword?
translation.ja: サムライの剣に見えます？

translation.en: Would you like to examine it, sir?
No, we are done here.
[Mallory] So the launch is scrubbed?
I can't hear you over the rotors.
translation.ja: ローターの音で聞こえん

translation.en: -Well, this is absurd. -[chattering]
So is this actually happening or not? There's no point if it's not happening...
translation.ja: 発射するのか？ しないなら無駄足…

translation.en: Excuse me, congresspeople.
Brad...
no interruptions for five minutes.
[softly] ♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪
translation.ja: アルーバ　ジャマイカ 　　　君を連れて行きたい

translation.en: ♪ Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
translation.ja: バミューダ　バハマ 　　行こうぜ　お嬢さん

translation.en: ♪ Key Largo, Montego Baby, why don't we go? ♪
translation.ja: キー･ラーゴ　モンテゴ 一緒に行こう

translation.en: ♪ Jamaica, off the Florida keys ♪
translation.ja: ジャマイカ 　　フロリダキーズ沖に

translation.en: ♪ There's a place called Kokomo ♪
translation.ja: ココモという場所があるんだ

translation.en: ♪ That's where you wanna go To get away from it all ♪
translation.ja: 何もかも忘れたい時は 　　　　　そこへ行くのさ

translation.en: ♪ Bodies in the sand ♪
♪ Tropical drinks melting in your hand ♪
translation.ja: 手の中でドリンクがとける

translation.en: ♪ We'll be falling in love To the rhythm of a steel drum band ♪
translation.ja: 僕らは恋に落ちる ドラムのリズムに 　　合わせて　このココモで

translation.en: ♪ Down in Koko-- ♪
translation.ja: ドラムのリズムに 　　合わせて　このココモで

translation.en: They're gone.
Congresspeople! Congresspeople!
The launch is on.
-What? -See you at 1700.
But you--
Sheila? Yeah.
Okay. Okay, okay. Okay. Okay.
Don't, don't-- Please don't skitter away.
translation.ja: お願いだから逃げないで

translation.en: Please, this is for your own safety.
Come on. I'm trying to save you! Damn it, get back here.
translation.ja: 私は助けたいだけよ 戻りなさい

translation.en: Our country, the oldest democracy in the world,
translation.ja: 世界最古の 民主主義国家である我が国は

translation.en: put a man on the moon.
It was perhaps our greatest moment up until that point.
translation.ja: これは我々にとって 最高の瞬間であり

translation.en: Alongside the Constitution, the Bill of Rights,
translation.ja: 憲法成立と 人権保障に並ぶ偉業だ

translation.en: and, of course, the Miracle on Ice.
Today we launch Epsilon 6,
a collaborative effort between the scientists of the United States,
translation.ja: 科学者の努力の結晶だ 米国と日本 欧州―

translation.en: Japan, Europe, Turkey, Israel, Australia,
translation.ja: トルコ イスラエル オーストラリア

translation.en: -and our old enemy, Russia. -[phone camera clicks]
And this will bring us one step closer to returning to the moon,
translation.ja: これで月に一歩 近づく

translation.en: and, from there, to Mars.
There will be setbacks along the way.
translation.ja: 道のりは険しいだろう

translation.en: There are risks to every great endeavor.
translation.ja: 偉業には必ずリスクが伴う

translation.en: But greatness was never won without suffering.
translation.ja: だが痛みなくして 成し遂げられはしない

translation.en: And sacrifice.
I am so, so damn proud of all of you.
translation.ja: 私は皆さんを 大変 誇りに思う

translation.en: [chuckling] Oh, my God. He's really on the edge.
[clears throat] So...
without further ado,
with this button,
I so launch...
Epsilon 6.
-Liked the Miracle on Ice reference. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.ja: いい演説で どうも

translation.en: Aw. I should be tweeting this.
Where'd it go?
[whispering] What's going on? Did it blow up?
Not yet.
Epsilon 6 is in orbit.
Yeah, well, he'll probably have me transferred tomorrow
translation.ja: うん　明日には転属かも

translation.en: once he has a moment to think about it.
[scoffs] But what was I supposed to do? You put a helicopter down in the wrong spot,
translation.ja: でも 適当な場所に ヘリは下ろせない

translation.en: and someone could get their head removed.
translation.ja: 誰かの首をハネるかも

translation.en: Hang on a second, Mom.
"Sorry I snapped at you. Glad you're on our team."
translation.ja: 〝宇宙軍四つ星大将 マーク･ネアード〞 “八つ当たりして すまん 君は仲間だ”

translation.en: [Mallory] You know, there's one thing that I don't get.
You were right about the launch, yet you don't know anything about science.
translation.ja: 君の判断が正しかった まるで科学を知らないのに

translation.en: Guess I know a little about people.
When we we're out at the launch site, there were two tiny clouds in the sky.
translation.ja: 発射台の上には 小さな雲が２つあった

translation.en: Chan had an umbrella.
translation.ja: チャンは傘を持ってた

translation.en: People like that can't handle any risk at all.
translation.ja: そういう人間は リスクを犯せない

translation.en: There's no way we are getting back to the moon with that kind of thinking.
translation.ja: そこまで用心深い人間は 月へなど行けない

translation.en: That's a good observation. Well reasoned.
translation.ja: 優れた観察眼と判断だ

translation.en: Cheers.
Thank you, Doctor.
You know what?
Epsilon should be passing right about now.
translation.ja: ちょうどイプシロンが通るぞ

translation.en: -[Mark sighs] -Do you see it?
Oh, yeah, there's a spark.
translation.ja: ほら あそこに光が

translation.en: Beautiful. Wow.
[Mark] I got it.
[Mallory] Wait, is that a second spark?
[inhaling sharply] Motherfucker!
♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪ ♪ To Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
translation.ja: フレッド･ウィラードに 哀悼の意を捧げます

translation.en: ♪ I want to take you down to Kokomo ♪
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　藤原 千春
